# The `GraphTraits.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the little GraphTraits&lt;X&gt; template class that should be specialized by classes that want to be iteratable by generic graph iterators. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the little GraphTraits&lt;X&gt; template class that should be specialized by classes that want to be iteratable by generic graph iterators.

This file also defines the marker class Inverse that is used to iterate over graphs in a graph defined, inverse ordering...

<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GraphTraits - This class should be specialized by different graph types...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is why the default version is empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This template evolved from supporting &#96;BasicBlock&#96; to also later supporting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more complex types (e.g. CFG and DomTree).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GraphTraits can be used to create a view over a graph interpreting it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// differently without requiring a copy of the original graph. This could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be achieved by carrying more data in NodeRef. See LoopBodyTraits for one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GraphType&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Elements to provide:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typedef NodeRef           - Type of Node token in the graph, which should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                             be cheap to copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typedef ChildIteratorType - Type used to iterate over children in graph,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                             dereference to a NodeRef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static NodeRef getEntryNode(const GraphType &amp;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Return the entry node of the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static ChildIteratorType child&#95;begin(NodeRef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static ChildIteratorType child&#95;end  (NodeRef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Return iterators that point to the beginning and ending of the child</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    node list for the specified node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typedef  ...iterator nodes&#95;iterator; - dereference to a NodeRef</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static nodes&#95;iterator nodes&#95;begin(GraphType &#42;G)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static nodes&#95;iterator nodes&#95;end  (GraphType &#42;G)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    nodes&#95;iterator/begin/end - Allow iteration over all nodes in the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typedef EdgeRef           - Type of Edge token in the graph, which should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                             be cheap to copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typedef ChildEdgeIteratorType - Type used to iterate over children edges in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                             graph, dereference to a EdgeRef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static ChildEdgeIteratorType child&#95;edge&#95;begin(NodeRef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static ChildEdgeIteratorType child&#95;edge&#95;end(NodeRef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Return iterators that point to the beginning and ending of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     edge list for the given callgraph node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static NodeRef edge&#95;dest(EdgeRef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Return the destination node of an edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static unsigned       size       (GraphType &#42;G)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Return total number of nodes in the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Optionally implement the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static unsigned getNumber(NodeRef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Return a unique number of a node. Numbers are ideally dense, these are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    used to store nodes in a vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static unsigned getMaxNumber(GraphType &#42;G)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Return the maximum number that getNumber() will return, or 0 if this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    unknown. Intended for reserving large enough buffers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static unsigned getNumberEpoch(GraphType &#42;G)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Return the &quot;epoch&quot; of the node numbers. Should return a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    number after renumbering, so users can assert that the epoch didn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    change =&gt; numbers are still valid. If renumberings are not tracked, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    is always valid to return a constant value. This is solely for to ease</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    debugging by having a way to detect use of outdated numbers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If anyone tries to use this class without having an appropriate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specialization, make an error.  If you get this error, it&#39;s because you</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to include the appropriate specialization of GraphTraits&lt;&gt; for your</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// graph, or you need to define it for a new graph type. Either that or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// your argument to XXX&#95;begin(...) is unknown or needs to have the proper .h</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file #include&#39;d.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits/#a741f7d63af17a7bd0bcf63f68e8658bd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits/#a741f7d63af17a7bd0bcf63f68e8658bd">NodeRef</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GraphType::UnknownGraphTypeError;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Indicate whether a GraphTraits&lt;NodeT&gt;::getNumber() is supported.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeT&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf1ad174f29a434886594433ce8a787f">is&#95;detected&lt;detail::has&#95;number&#95;t, NodeT&gt;::value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inverse - This class is used as a little marker class to tell the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterator to iterate over the graph in a graph defined &quot;Inverse&quot; ordering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not all graphs define an inverse ordering, and if they do, it depends on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the graph exactly what that is.  Here&#39;s an example of usage with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// df&#95;iterator:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// idf&#95;iterator&lt;Method&#42;&gt; I = idf&#95;begin(M), E = idf&#95;end(M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (; I != E; ++I) &#123; ... &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Which is equivalent to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// df&#95;iterator&lt;Inverse&lt;Method&#42;&gt;&gt; I = idf&#95;begin(M), E = idf&#95;end(M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (; I != E; ++I) &#123; ... &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GraphType&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse/#a8fbccad4b16b94dadafea57bad9ee017">Inverse</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse/#a8fbccad4b16b94dadafea57bad9ee017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse/#a8fbccad4b16b94dadafea57bad9ee017">Inverse</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GraphType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse/#a169e126ff147c68b5f1cfd6a1d2c8286">Graph</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Provide a partial specialization of GraphTraits so that the inverse of an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inverse falls back to the original graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits-8625a127f11840f2b3bd3cdce18f5a97"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse">Inverse</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inverse">Inverse</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt;&gt;&gt; : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits</a>&lt;T&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
